mapper.select: SELECT orders.row_id, orders.order_id, orders.customer_id, orders.price, orders.status, orders.description, order_events.event_time AS create_time FROM orders, order_events WHERE order_events.order_id = orders.order_id AND orders.status LIKE #{status} AND order_events.event_title = 'CREATION' ORDER BY orders.row_id DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT orders.row_id, orders.order_id, orders.customer_id, orders.price, orders.status, orders.description, order_events.event_time AS create_time FROM orders, order_events WHERE order_events.order_id = orders.order_id AND orders.status LIKE #{status} AND order_events.event_title = 'CREATION' AND orders.row_id < #{start_row} ORDER BY order_events.event_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT order_id, customer_id, price, status, description FROM orders WHERE order_id = #{order_id}
SELECT order_eventid, order_id, event_time, event_title, event_executor FROM order_events WHERE order_id = #{order_id}

SELECT ot.order_id, ot.order_itemid, oi.order_infoid, oi.product_id, products.product_name, products.unit_price, pi.order_patient_infoid, pi.name, pi.gender, pi.age, pi.phone, pi.country, pi.province, pi.city, pi.district, pi.address, pi.has_diabetic, pi.height, pi.weight FROM order_infos AS oi, order_items AS ot, products, order_patient_infos AS pi WHERE ot.order_id = #{order_id} AND ot.order_itemid = oi.order_itemid AND oi.product_id = ot.product_id AND products.product_id = oi.product_id AND pi.order_infoid = oi.order_infoid
SELECT order_items.order_id FROM order_items, order_infos WHERE order_infos.order_infoid = #{order_infoid} AND order_items.order_itemid = order_infos.order_itemid
